neighbors.name: Jill N Wilkins & Kevin W Wilkins
neighbors.claims: Jill N. Wilkins is a registered Physician Assistant based in Hagerstown, MD, with a residential address in Hedgesville, WV ([NPI Registry](https://npiregistry.cms.hhs.gov/provider-view/1194280032)). Kevin W. Wilkins is listed as a resident at the same location ([Whitepages](https://www.whitepages.com/name/Kevin-W-Wilkins/WV)). No record of the Wilkins family taking a public stance on local development or holding public office was found in available public sources.
neighbors.influence_justification: Medical professional; no known civic leadership roles

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach via a trusted community member. Given Jill's medical background, emphasize health and safety standards of the project, along with assurances that property values and privacy will be maintained.

citations.claim: Jill N. Wilkins is a registered Physician Assistant based in Hagerstown, MD, with a residential address in Hedgesville, WV
citations.title: NPI Registry - Jill N Wilkins

citations.claim: Kevin W. Wilkins is listed as a resident at the same location
citations.title: Whitepages Listing

neighbors.name: Robert M Cloud & Brenda L Cloud
neighbors.claims: Robert M. Cloud serves as an elected Supervisor for the Eastern Panhandle Conservation District (EPCD), representing Berkeley County ([WVCA Directory](https://www.wvca.us/suDirectory.cfm)). In this capacity, he participates in board meetings regarding agricultural enhancement programs, watershed grants, and conservation planning ([EPCD Minutes](https://www.wvca.us/district/upload/41246.pdf)). The Cloud family is a recipient of agricultural subsidies ([EWG Database](https://farm.ewg.org/addrsearch.php?z=1&zip=25427&page=1)). The EPCD has previously discussed the environmental impact of solar projects on farmland and soil erosion ([Vision Root](https://www.visionroot.org/category/environment/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Elected Supervisor, Eastern Panhandle Conservation District

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage directly acknowledging his role as an EPCD Supervisor. Focus heavily on stormwater management, soil conservation, and pollinator-friendly ground cover, demonstrating how the project aligns with district conservation goals.

citations.claim: Robert M. Cloud serves as an elected Supervisor for the Eastern Panhandle Conservation District (EPCD), representing Berkeley County
citations.title: West Virginia Conservation Agency Supervisor Directory

citations.claim: participates in board meetings regarding agricultural enhancement programs, watershed grants, and conservation planning
citations.title: Eastern Panhandle Conservation District Board Meeting Minutes

citations.claim: The Cloud family is a recipient of agricultural subsidies
citations.title: EWG Farm Subsidy Database

citations.claim: The EPCD has previously discussed the environmental impact of solar projects on farmland and soil erosion
citations.title: Vision Root Environment Blog - EPCD Solar Discussions

neighbors.name: Alexander L Givens & Keri L Givens
neighbors.claims: Alexander L. Givens is the registered owner of a trucking and transport business, Alexander L Givens (USDOT 1409364), based in Hedgesville, WV ([DOT Profile](https://dcontrol.com/profile/pentoney-brothers-contracting-llc/carriers)). Alexander L. Givens and Keri L. Givens are listed as residents of Berkeley County ([Whitepages](https://www.whitepages.com/name/Alexander-Givens/WV)). No known public comments or leadership roles by the Givens in community development issues have been found.

approach_recommendations.engage: A friendly personal outreach is recommended. Given his background in transport, address any concerns regarding construction traffic and road use, while reassuring them about property value protections.

citations.claim: Alexander L. Givens is the registered owner of a trucking and transport business, Alexander L Givens (USDOT 1409364), based in Hedgesville, WV
citations.title: DOT Profile - Alexander L Givens

citations.claim: Alexander L. Givens and Keri L. Givens are listed as residents of Berkeley County
citations.title: Whitepages Listing

neighbors.name: Mark Chenoweth & Scarlett Chenoweth
neighbors.claims: Mark Chenoweth is the President and General Counsel of the New Civil Liberties Alliance (NCLA), a legal organization focused on challenging the administrative state ([NCLA Bio](https://www.legistorm.com/person/bio/158982/Markham_Sterling_Chenoweth.html)). He previously served as the first Chief of Staff to Congressman Mike Pompeo and as legal counsel at the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission ([LegiStorm](https://www.legistorm.com/person/bio/158982/Markham_Sterling_Chenoweth.html)). He has testified before the U.S. House Judiciary Committee regarding regulatory reform ([Congress Testimony](https://www.congress.gov/118/meeting/house/116992/witnesses/HHRG-118-JU05-Wstate-ChenowethM-20240320.pdf)). He was named one of Washington DC's 500 Most Influential People of 2025 ([Washingtonian](https://washingtonian.com/2025/05/07/washington-dcs-500-most-influential-people-of-2025/)). Scarlett Chenoweth is listed as a resident of Hedgesville ([Whitepages](https://www.whitepages.com/name/Scarlett-Chenoweth/WV)).
neighbors.influence_justification: President of NCLA; former Congressional Chief of Staff

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach with high-level professionalism. Be prepared to discuss regulatory compliance and property rights in detail. Emphasize that the project respects private property rights and avoids government overreach.

citations.claim: Mark Chenoweth is the President and General Counsel of the New Civil Liberties Alliance (NCLA)
